name: Boyo Ball
description:
Control a little ball dude through 100 levels with physics, platforming, and puzzles.

Controls are simple and intuitive. Press and drag to launch the ball throughout obstacles and fine tune your skills to surpass each new challenge.

- The ball normally bounces off of walls. Use this to gain height!
- The ball can deploy spikes to eliminate bounce. This can also stick to some surfaces!
- Launch mid-air to do a boost. Great for changing direction!

Each level adds progressive difficulty and mechanics to create a fun, engaging experience. Approach each level creatively, there's more than one way to win!

Complete all 100 levels to unlock the best secret known to man.
